Farber, whose work on academic experimental computer networks helped define the evolution of the early internet, died on February 7 at age 91  —  A researcher, professor and federal policy adviser, he guided students who went on to do groundbreaking work in connecting the world online.

Joining deals on Xenoblade Chronicles X: Definitive Edition and Kirby’s Return to Dream Land Deluxe, Amazon is also now offering Princess Peach: Showtime! Down at $29.99 with free shipping for Prime members or in orders over $35. This is a straight up 50% off on a title rarely discounted at Amazon. These new offers are also joining a fresh offer via Woot on Donkey Kong Bananza down at $60 an a whole bunch more below.

  • Xenoblade Chronicles X: Definitive Edition $40 (Reg. $60)
  • Kirby’s Return to Dream Land Deluxe $40 (Reg. $60)
  • Princess Peach: Showtime! $30 (Reg. $60)
  • Donkey Kong Bananza $60 (Reg. $70)

Alongside the ongoing power station sales and flash offers below, we also secured a massive $1,500 exclusive price cut on the Gendome Home3000 Portable Power Station to a new $799 low, which features the addition of wind-charging, smart home integration, and 50-minute AC fast-charging. items.title: Lectric’s Presidents Day sale increases e-bike bundle savings up to $893 – get your next American-made ride starting from $999
items.summary:
Lectric has officially launched its Presidents Day Sale with increased e-bike bundle savings up to $893, one of the biggest sales events each year from the popular brand that sits beside Prime Day and Black Friday events. Among the massive increase in savings, our top pick for anyone looking to upgrade their commute is the Lectric XP4 750 Long-Range Folding Utility e-bikes with up to $514 in FREE gear at $1,299 shipped, which we went hands-on with in our review back over the summer. You would normally be spending up to $1,813 on these bundles if there were no savings, which gives you a LevelUp cargo rack, an Elite headlight, a suspension seatpost, an accordion-style bike lock, and a phone mount on four of the models, while the XP4 750 Tempest Grey Step-Over e-bike, specifically, is also getting a 5A fast charger that can recharge the bike from empty in up to 3.5 hours. Of course, there are also the standard XP4 Folding Utility e-bikes getting $79 bundles at $999 shipped. Head below to browse the full lineup of increased deals while they last!

items.title: Save up to $600 on Ride1Up e-bikes for Presidents Day, like the Prodigy V2 mid-drive e-bikes at lows from $1,895, more
items.summary:
Alongside the other e-bike brands we’ve already spotted doing so, Ride1Up is joining the parade with its Presidents Day Sale that is taking up to $600 off e-bikes. The biggest of these deals is on the Prodigy V2 Brose Step-Thru Mid-Drive 9-Speed e-bike at $1,895 shipped, or you can grab its step-over variant for $100 more, otherwise, the alternate option is the upgraded Prodigy V2 Belt-Drive model at $2,595 shipped. The typical chain-drive models would run you $2,495 outside of this sale, while the belt-drive model goes for $2,795, with most of the sales over 2025 having seen costs dropped to $1,995 and $2,595 on average. Once again, the belt-drive variant is retaining its $200 markdown, while the chain-drive models are once again repeating the deals we saw during Black Friday and Christmas for $500/$600 markdowns – with all three back at their lowest tracked prices. You’ll find a large selection of other e-bikes benefitting from discounts below.

items.summary:
Velotric has not only just launched its new Discover 3 and Discover M e-bikes, but is now officially launching its Presidents Day Sale with up to $750 e-bike savings that will end on Monday with the holiday. The most notable change from the previous sale is Velotric’s T1 ST Plus Lightweight Urban e-bike getting a FREE range extender battery at $1,299 shipped. The e-bike is retaining its previous price cut from a $1,649 MSRP, but instead of getting basic FREE add-on gear, you’re getting the range extender battery (a $400 value) for free – which would cost you a total $2,049 without any of this event’s savings. The last time we saw this same offer was during the brand’s 3-day Christmas flash sale, with the $750 savings and the price for it all being the best deal we have tracked over the last year. Head below to learn more and see the full lineup of savings lasting through the weekend only.

items.summary:
By way of its official eufy Amazon storefront, Anker is offering returning low prices on three of its popular smart locks – all with palm vein recognition. Things start with the base FamiLock E34 Smart Lock at $179.98 shipped, matching the direct website pricing, while the more advanced FamiLock S3 Smart Lock is down at $229.48 shipped (matching its direct pricing), and the most advanced FamiLock S3 Max Smart Lock at $279.98 shipped (matching its direct pricing). These three models usually go for $280, $350, and $400 at full price, respectively, which we last saw drop to these all-time low prices back during Christmas sales, while we also saw some shorter-term dips to these rates in early January. Now, you’re getting the first shot to grab them at their best prices in 2026, saving you $100 or $120 off the going rates.

items.title: Whisker’s Valentine’s sale offers up to $150 savings on premium Litter-Robot bundles, prices start from $499
items.summary:
One of my absolute favorite cat-focused brands, Whisker, is currently having its Valentine’s Day Sale and seeing up to $150 discounts across its lineup of self-cleaning litter box bundles. Of course, the most affordable of the three new models and the legacy models is the latest Whisker Litter-Robot EVO that starts from $599 shipped, while its 3-year warranty bundle is priced at $699 shipped – both of which aren’t seeing price cuts, sadly, but retain more accessible pricing compared to others. Where the savings start is on the Starter Bundle for $729 shipped, down from $832, and coming with a litter-trap mat, a 3-pack of odor traps, 25 waste drawer liners, a 20-pound bag of litter, and a 3-year extended warranty, which comes in $53 under the pricing we saw during Black Friday and Christmas sales for a new all-time low. Head below to browse the full lineup of new and legacy offers during this event.
